tags: tbh at first I planned to write an angsty piece
one of my best friends loves him though
hope I didn't mess him up too bad
question: “ … i’m sorry. “ for bakugo??
answer:
Here you go dearie! Sorry this took a while, hopefully it’s worth the wait…

Also I know you guys are all crazy about bakuboy, so I hope you enjoy <3

Smoochies from Ma!


You never thought you’d see the day Katsuki would apologise.

Everyone thought his pride would be a big problem in a relationship, and it was, sometimes.

Truth be told, you didn’t mind his prideful and stubborn demeanour all that much. The fights you had with him were more a matter of principles… after all, you couldn’t let your own boyfriend step all over you.

Not that he’d mean to, naturally. In his eyes, he was either pushing you to do better or really just proving you that he was right (once again).

Even when you wouldn’t tell him off, he would usually realise what a jerk he had been and find some way to make up for it. Whether it was by being gentler to you the following days, or by doing something he knew would make you happy, even if he hated it.

But he would never voice any apology. Or at least that’s what you thought, until one day…

“…I’m sorry.”

Whipping your head in his direction, you looked at him with incredulous eyes. You must have heard him wrong…

“Excuse me?”

“Don’t make me say it again.” He grumbled, obviously embarrassed.

Later you would curse yourself for not recording him… But in this instant you felt so shocked and confused… you actually feared the worst.

“What on earth are you apologising for?” You asked, frowning and eyeing him suspiciously. “Are you leaving me, or something?”

You were only half-joking at this point, but he didn’t leave you enough time to actually worry about this possibility.

“What the fuck?! Hell no I’m not leaving you! Why?! You fucking tired of me?!”

Now it was his turn to get anxious and you were both such messes…this was getting ridiculous.

“Of course not, you know I love you. You just surprised me. Where is this coming from?”

He got silent again and you could see him tense. There really was something troubling him.

“I’m a pain. I know that.” He finally said. “And sometimes I worry it might be too much for you… I don’t know I guess I just don’t want you to think I don’t fucking care.”

You could feel your heart lurch in your chest at his words but you were too stunned to answer anything. While you gaped at him, Katsuki stared to fidget with his hands before looking at you again with an angry scowl. Your lack of response made him think he had been right to worry and his answer to emotional vulnerability was always anger.

“But that’s how I fucking function so if you ain’t happy with it you can just-”

You shut him up with a surprise attack hug, effectively turning him into a flustered grumbling mess.

“You big dummy! I’ve known you for so long, if the way you acted really bothered me I wouldn’t be with you today. I love you for you, angry pouts and all. And I know you care. You might not say it but you show it with your actions and that’s what matters to me. I never want you to change.”

You gave him a loud kiss on the cheek to emphasise your words and he held you close, his usual cocky smirk stretching his lips. Although it seemed like it was to hide deeper emotions.

“Good.”

reblog.comment:
Here you go dearie! Sorry this took a while, hopefully it’s worth the wait…

Also I know you guys are all crazy about bakuboy, so I hope you enjoy <3

Smoochies from Ma!

summary: So while Ben went to U.A, would it be cool if Toga also had a omnitrix (It would look like bens omnitrix but it would be red)
question: So while Ben went to U.A, would it be cool if Toga also had a omnitrix (It would look like bens omnitrix but it would be red)
answer:
She’d probably think the omnitrix is cool though idk if it’d be for her since I think her thought process when using her quirk/transforming is based on the person she likes and wants to be like and I have some doubts about her wanting to be spaces aliens but who knows!

Also maybe she might be thinking “This alien watch isn’t cute, I can’t wear this!” lol

Also maybe she might be thinking “This alien watch isn’t cute, I can’t wear this!” lol
